sentences.sContent: Peter is a famous apothecary of this town.
sentences.sContent_eng: Peter is a famous apothecary of this town.
sentences.sCn: 彼得是这个镇上有名的药剂师。

sentences.sContent: Mrs. Lovett: She poisoned herself. Arsenic from the apothecary around the corner… and he's got your daughter.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mrs. Lovett: She poisoned herself. Arsenic from the apothecary around the corner… and he's got your daughter.
sentences.sCn: 洛薇特夫人：她服毒自尽了，是从街拐角的药剂师那里得到的砒霜……他接管了你的女儿。

trans.tranOther: someone who mixed and sold medicines in the past
